t_and_c.main:
Police NG is a security app designed to protect you, your family, properties, friends and neighbors. it provides the means for citizens to help the Nigerian police in fighting crime and attending to emergencies.


Sender Location is always sent with a report even in anonymous mode. By using this app, you accept all Terms of use and accept our Privacy policy.
t_and_c.emphasized: NOTE: Intentionally sending false information or filing reports to create undue stress on public resources may subject the sender to arrest with imposition of fine, imprisonment or both.
